comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: cyberboxingzone.com/boxing/kellar-terry.htm To judge from his list of fights on that web page, around October 1914, Kellar returned to the States from two years abroad, mainly in Australia, but in early 1914 in the UK. He fought Colin Bell three times in Australia in 1912. According to boxrec.com/media/index.php/Colin_Bell Bell was Australian. NLA has several pictures of him: catalogue.nla.gov.au/Search/Home?lookfor=subject:%22Bell%.... George Lawrence is mentioned in www.stlallsports.com/sports_history/0511_famous_boxing_ma... as one of "the well-remembered boxing managers of the more modern years"!
